text_block_list.text:
On the day of the Selection Race. I went to see Kawakami 
Princess before the race started…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Good day, trainer. You came to see the show.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
To be honest, I haven't been sleeping well! I was so 
worried that my brain stopped working, so I watched all 
49 episodes of PriFi in one sitting!
choice_data_list: Oh my God, are you okay!?
Oh my God, are you okay!?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
I don't know! But I have to do it. Even PriFi said, "As a 
princess, you should fight to the end!"!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Thank you! Well then, I'll get going!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Third race of the Selection Race will begin under blue skies, a 
complete change from last night's rain. Who will be the one to 
show their ability and grab the ticket to debut!?

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The field is tight, and the mood is more competitive than ever, 
as all the Uma Musume enter the gate. And now… they're off!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Ha… Ha…….

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (Ah, it still feels so good to be able to run at full speed……!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(It's always been that way. I love princesses. 
But I also love to run)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(I was so in-awe when I met King-san. She's graceful, she's 
like a princess…… and that strength that never 
fails her ……)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(Both Princess Fighter and King-san had the same sparkle. 
They were sparkling, dazzling, and I was jealous of it……)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (But then what…… was it that I really longed for?)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Haa…… haa…… argh……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(It's so painful - I don't know. I don't know what I was imitating 
for. What do I want to be…… What kind of a princess do I want 
to become……?)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(Trainer told me that I had my own ideal…… 
My "ideal" should be there somewhere!)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Oh dang, just before the last turn, she slipped! 
Kawakami Princess swayed to the outer lane.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Was she trying to sprint and failed?…… or is it a 
lane-correcting error. Welp, she's a pre-debutante, I guess 
it can't be helped……

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: It's hard to get back up to speed from here.…… poor thing.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (I don't understand…… am I not good enough……?)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (Can't I be a…… princess ……?)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
She held on! Kawakami Princess is back and running again. 
But she's now far away from the leading pack!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Can she catch up? The gap is not closing. But she's still 
running――
choice_data_list: Run! Don't give up on your ideals!
Run! Don't give up on your ideals!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ～～～～ts、R, Roger thaaaaaaat… ！！！！

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Oh, wow! Kawakami Princess is in incredible pursuit. She is 
merging with the leading pack from the outer lane! This is 
incredible!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Ahhhhh, I am…… I am a Princess! 
I'm going to become a princess!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(Yes. I just wanted to not give up. Not give up on being a 
princess! And not give up on being myself―!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
(Because "ideals" are meaningless unless they are an 
extension of yourself. There's no point in running if you 
abandon your aspirations, your personality!)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Doryaaaaaaaaaaaaa～～～!!!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Gooooooooooal!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Complete combustion! Showing her indomitable fighting spirit, 
Kawakami Princess! The winner, Kawakami Princess, 
now crosses the finish line in first place!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Allow me to open your eyes!!! 
As a princess, I can overcome any adversity～～～!!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Hey, trainer! I did it! That's what I'm 
talking about! I'm the one who won!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
It was all thanks to trainer's cheers! I will never forget what I 
heard at that moment!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yes! I want to be a "gorgeous, graceful, and brave princess". 
But a princess should really…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Should never give up on who she wants to be and 
keep running, even in the mud! A true princess is a one who 
never gives up on her "ideal"!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: So, I don't care if I'm a little less graceful now! I'll be myself fornow, and one day I'll become graceful!

Seeing her radiant expression, I made up my mind. It's time to 
tell her.
choice_data_list: Let me help you with that dream.
Will you let me help you with that dream?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: What?…… Ah, by help you mean… is it!?

If she pursues her "ideal" as a princess, I want to be a 
"legendary trainer" to support her.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Whooooooooo ～～～～!!!!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Of course! When I lost sight of my "ideal", 
it was you who woke me up!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
If it's with you, I can surely become the "ideal princess" 
I dreamed of. No, I "will" become one!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
The two of us will smash the legend together～! Aim for 
Brilliance! Gracefulness! The strongest and fastest princess!

Thus began the days with the tomboyish 
princess, the Kawakami Princess!
